Title: Steps towards Collective Sustainability in Biomedical Research
Abstract: © 2018 Elsevier LtdThe optimism surrounding multistakeholder research initiatives does not match the clear view of policies that are needed to exploit the potential of these collaborations. Here we propose some action items that stem from the integration between research advancements with the perspectives of patient-advocacy organizations, academia, and industry.
